Text:
I went and saw "Happy Feet" in theatre last night, and must say it's by far the cutest movie I've seen in years.

You won't hear this often on ThePirateBay, but if you get a chance, spend the $7.00 and GO SEE IT! I'll probably download it first chance I get, but will still but the DVD when it arrives just so I can have the extras and whatnot. 

Happy Feet was GREAT!!
